verses.text: \w And|strong="H2719"\w* Achab \w told|strong="H5046"\w* Jezabel \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* Elias \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w how|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w zeal|strong="H7065"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w been|strong="H7065"\w* \w zealous|strong="H7065"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* forsaken thy \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w thrown|strong="H2040"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w* thy \w altars|strong="H4196"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w alone|strong="H0905"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w bowed|strong="H3766"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* worshipped \w him|strong="H3605"\w* kissing \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hands.
